00024 GrUberDetailCache* gGrUberDetailCache = 0;
00025 
00027 #define UBERTEX_DETAIL_ATLAS_NAME                       "UberTexture_DetailAtlas"
00028 #define UBERTEX_DETAIL_ATLAS_WIDTH                      ( 4 * ( GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY ) )
00029 #define UBERTEX_DETAIL_ATLAS_HEIGHT                     ( 4 * ( GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY ) )
00030 
00032 #define DETAIL_CACHE_BUMP_NAME                          "UberDetailCache_Bump"
00033 #define DETAIL_CACHE_DIFFUSE_NAME                       "UberDetailCache_Diffuse"
00034 #define DETAIL_CACHE_SPECULAR_NAME                      "UberDetailCache_Specular"
00035 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_NAME                          "UberDetailCache_Mask"
00036 #define DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM                        4096
00037 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM                       2048
00038 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM_IN_TILES      ( DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM / GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE )
00039 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM                           ( DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM / GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE )
00040 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_MIP_PAGE_DIM          DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM_IN_TILES
00041 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DATA_SIZE                     ( ( DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM * DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM ) / 8 )
00042 #define DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DXT5R_BLOCK_COUNT     256
00043 
00045 DECLARE_ALIGNED_16( __int64, _maskTempDXT5R[ DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DXT5R_BLOCK_COUNT ] );
00046 
00048 __int64* _maskCodeLUT = 0;
00049

00055 //==========================================================
00057 //==========================================================
00058 
00059 //----------------------------------------------------------
00060 GrUberDetailCache::GrUberDetailCache()
00061 : _curPackX( 0 )
00062 , _curPackY( 0 )
00063 , _curPackMaxY( 0 )
00064 {
00066         gGrUberDetailCache = this;
00067 
00069         _maskCodeLUT = ( __int64* )AlignedAlloc( 16, 65536 * sizeof( __int64 ) );
00070         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 65536; ++i )
00071         {
00072                 __int64 value = 0xFF00;
00073                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 16; ++j )
00074                 {
00076                         int bit = ( ( i >> j ) & 1 );
00077                         value |= ( bit << ( ( j * 3 ) + 16 ) );
00078                 }
00079 
00081                 _maskCodeLUT[ i ] = value;
00082         }
00083 
00085         ClearPackingState();
00086 
00088         AllocDetailTextures();
00089 }
00090 
00091 //----------------------------------------------------------
00092 GrUberDetailCache::~GrUberDetailCache()
00093 {
00095         gGrUberDetailCache = 0;
00096 
00098         delete[] _maskData;
00099 
00101         AlignedFree( _maskCodeLUT );
00102         _maskCodeLUT = 0;
00103 }

00110 //----------------------------------------------------------
00111 bool
00112 GrUberDetailCache::ReserveRegion( unsigned int& tileX, unsigned int& tileY, unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00113 {
00115         B_ASSERT( width < DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM_IN_TILES );
00116         B_ASSERT( height < DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM_IN_TILES );
00117 
00120         unsigned int endX = _curPackX + width;
00121         if ( endX > DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM_IN_TILES )
00122         {
00124                 _curPackX = 0;
00125                 _curPackY = _curPackMaxY;
00126                 endX = width;
00127         }
00128 
00132         unsigned int endY = _curPackY + height;
00133         if ( endY > DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM_IN_TILES )
00134                 return false;
00135 
00137         tileX = _curPackX;
00138         tileY = _curPackY;
00139 
00141         _curPackX = endX;
00142         _curPackMaxY = Max( _curPackMaxY, endY );
00143 
00145         return true;
00146 }
00147 
00148 //----------------------------------------------------------
00149 void
00150 GrUberDetailCache::UploadTile( unsigned int lod, unsigned int tileX, unsigned int tileY, const void* bump,
00151                                                            const void* diffuse, const void* specular )
00152 {
00154         unsigned int pageX = ( lod & 1 );
00155         unsigned int pageY = ( lod & 2 );
00156 
00158         unsigned int pelX = tileX * GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE + pageX * DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM;
00159         unsigned int pelY = tileY * GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE + pageY * DETAIL_CACHE_MIP_PAGE_DIM;
00160 
00163         _detailBump->UploadPixelDataCompressed( 0, pelX, pelY, GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE, GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE,
00164                 bump, GL_COMPRESSED_RED_RGTC1, 2048 );
00165 
00167         _detailDiffuse->UploadPixelDataCompressed( 0, pelX, pelY, GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE, GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE,
00168                 diffuse, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT, 4096 );
00169 
00171         _detailSpecular->UploadPixelDataCompressed( 0, pelX, pelY, GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE, GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE,
00172                 specular, GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT, 4096 );
00173 
00175         unsigned int maskX = tileX + pageX * DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_MIP_PAGE_DIM;
00176         unsigned int maskY = tileY + pageY * DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_MIP_PAGE_DIM;
00177 
00179         unsigned int maskWordIdx = ( ( maskY >> 2 ) * ( DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM >> 2 ) ) + ( maskX >> 2 );
00180         unsigned int maskBitIdx = ( ( maskY & 3 ) << 2 ) | ( maskX & 3 );
00181         _maskData[ maskWordIdx ] |= ( 1 << maskBitIdx );
00182 }
00183 
00184 //----------------------------------------------------------
00185 void
00186 GrUberDetailCache::PrepareDetailCache()
00187 {
00189         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DXT5R_BLOCK_COUNT; ++i )
00190                 _maskTempDXT5R[ i ] = _maskCodeLUT[ _maskData[ i ] ];
00191 
00193         _detailMask->UploadPixelDataCompressed( 0, 0, 0, DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM, DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM, _maskTempDXT5R,
00194                 GL_COMPRESSED_RED_RGTC1, 2048 );
00195 
00197         ClearPackingState();
00198 
00200         MemSet( _maskData, 0, DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DATA_SIZE );
00201 }

00203 //----------------------------------------------------------
00204 void
00205 GrUberDetailCache::BindDetailTextures( unsigned int maskSampler, unsigned int bumpSampler,
00206                                                                            unsigned int diffuseSampler, unsigned int specularSampler )
00207 {
00208         _detailMask->Bind( maskSampler );
00209         _detailBump->Bind( bumpSampler );
00210         _detailDiffuse->Bind( diffuseSampler );
00211         _detailSpecular->Bind( specularSampler );
00212 }

00219 //----------------------------------------------------------
00220 void
00221 GrUberDetailCache::AllocDetailTextures()
00222 {
00224         const GrTextureBase::Flags kFlags = GrTextureBase::kNoMipMap | GrTextureBase::kNoCompress;
00225 
00227         _detailBump = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( DETAIL_CACHE_BUMP_NAME,
00228                 DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM, DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5R, kFlags, false );
00229 
00231         _detailDiffuse = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( DETAIL_CACHE_DIFFUSE_NAME,
00232                 DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM, DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5, kFlags, false );
00233 
00235         _detailSpecular = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( DETAIL_CACHE_SPECULAR_NAME,
00236                 DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM, DETAIL_CACHE_TEXTURE_DIM, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5, kFlags, false );
00237 
00239         _detailMask = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_NAME,
00240                 DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM, DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DIM, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5R, kFlags, false );
00241 
00243         _maskData = new unsigned short[ DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DATA_SIZE / 2 ];
00244         MemSet( _maskData, 0, DETAIL_CACHE_MASK_DATA_SIZE );
00245 }

00247 //----------------------------------------------------------
00248 void
00249 GrUberDetailCache::ClearPackingState()
00250 {
00251         _curPackX = 0;
00252         _curPackY = 0;
00253         _curPackMaxY = 0;
00254 }
